verbs.description: harissa sweet potato fritters [ARG0: i] [V: had] [ARG1: leftover sweet potatoes] and had to think up a new way to use them we love spice so i flavored these fun fritters with harissa just enough for flavor but not too spicy if you want more heat you can always adjust the spice to please your taste buds —teri rasey cadillac michigan sweet potato potato
